original_text: The Horites also lived in Seir formerly, but the people of Esau dispossessed them and destroyed them from before them and settled in their place, as Israel did to the land of their possession, which the Lord gave to them.)
korean_text: 호리 사람도 세일에 거주하였는데 에서의 자손이 그들을 멸하고 그 땅에 거주하였으니 이스라엘이 여호와께서 주신 기업의 땅에서 행한 것과 같았느니라)

sentences.original_text: The Horites also lived in Seir formerly
but the people of Esau dispossessed them
and destroyed them from before them
as Israel did to the land of their possession
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 이스라엘이 자기 소유의 땅에서 행한 것과 같으니

sentences.original_text: which the Lord gave to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅은 주께서 그들에게 주신 것이니라
